entry.title: Bio Brightener Stick
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 24.00

This magic illuminizing stick creates a hydrated, happy youthful glow in seconds. It’s the perfect trick for you sleepless workaholics to look rested and radiant! The rich creamy formula has a satiny smooth, weightless texture - free from harsh, artificial chemicals and petroleum. So, there’s no heavy, greasy film and no creasing.

• Highlights key facial features creating dimension and radiance

• Instantly creates the appearance of more youthful, hydrated skin

• Moves and breathes with the skin, no creasing

• Optically diffuses skin imperfections

• Soothes and protects with organic aloe, chamomile and green tea

• Natural Ingredients

• Made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles and bad mojo

Ingredients

Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Bees- wax), Silica, Mica (CI 77019), Olea europaea (Olive Oil)*, Castor Isostearate Beeswax Succinate **, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Mica (CI 77019), Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (and) Aloe Barbadenis (Aloe) Extract, Essential Oil blend, Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E), Lysine, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea)*, Roman An- themis Nobilis (Chamomile)* [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Carmine (CI 75470), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)]

Directions

Warm and blend product onto the face using fingertips. May be used to highlight and brighten the complexion. Build to the desired level of color impact.
